title: Emily and the Honeybees: Honeybees
description: Emily and the Honeybees is exciting, sweet and adventureous! One morning, Emily decides to make breakfast by herself. But suddenly the honey becomes too tricky and sticky, and it soon goes everywhere apart from on her piece of bread! Emily is now curious about where honey comes from and asks her mum to help her... Join Emily and follow the 'bzz bzz' sound to discover where the honeybees might be hiding... Could they be in the letterbox, or perhaps by the flowers...? Let's see!
author: Catherine Jane de Klerk
